Item.Name: Ample Hills Creamery
Item.Content:
Ample Hills Creamery in Disney's BoardWalk, Disney's BoardWalk, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Ample Hills Creamery

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18419410.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Treat yourself to a frosty cone straight out of Brooklyn, courtesy of this turn-of-the-century take on the ice cream parlor. After enjoying some mouthwatering samples—as many flavors as you wish—choose from over a dozen signature creations!

Item.Name: ESPN Club
Item.Content:
ESPN Club in Disney's BoardWalk, Disney's BoardWalk, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for ESPN Club

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001523.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Experience the ultimate in classic American pub cuisine, sports entertainment and shopping while you score nonstop action at the ESPN Club in Disney's BoardWalk. Seating is first-come, first-served and based on availability. However, you can now book weekday lunch reservations from 11:30 AM to 4:00 PM—on Monday through Friday only. We don’t take reservations for dinners (or for weekend lunches) due to the unpredictability of game schedules.
  Book ESPN Club Dining Reservations
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted
